There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan Ep47
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2046
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep123
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5161
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: On its maiden flight, an A380 airliner is hijacked by armed gunmen. Among the passengers is international security expert Gao Hao Jun, whose daughter has been taken hostage, putting her life in grave danger. Determined to save her, Gao confronts the hijackers head-on. Can he rescue all the passengers and thwart the crisis?

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Love is the only Answer
programme.desc: At Bo and Cheong wedding reception, the projected was initially showing their journey of love, but suddenly a flash of a clip of Cheong and a sexy girl being intimate came up. Bo calmly ran up to the stage and announced that the wedding is cancelled. The incident rapidly became a hot topic on the internet. Within a year, back to being single again, Bo and the living life happily Cheong maintains a good relationship. One day, Cheong decided to play with love and took Bo to participate in a swinging party. The conservative Bo initially wanted to leave, but after being bribed by Cheong, she helpless and stayed. At the swinging party, the two encounter Kit and his wife Man Lai. The 4 of them develop a romantic and hot relationship... At another wedding reception, when the projector plays the groom and bride's heartwarming clips, a flash of another clip that does not want to be seen comes up...

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: The sequel to "Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons", this happens after Monkey King has gained enlightenment and is Tang San Zang's disciple. Tang, Monkey King, Sandy and Pigsy continue their journey to the West, where they have to fight and eliminate demons while dealing with their own changes, putting their bond to the test.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in 1960s and 70s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep13
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep8
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Series 1 - Discover how 9.7 billion cups of Danone's Activia yogurt are made every year; how to make trail mix both healthy and delicious; why less mixing makes more tasty organic baby cookies; and why timing is everything when making powerhouse mushroom rice veggie burgers.

programme.title: The Future of Nature S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Forests - Science documentary looking at how forest ecosystems reduce global carbon levels and effect climate.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon begins his most ambitious journey yet; travelling the entire length of the Americas. In this first leg, Simon travels from Alaska, down through Canada to Vancouver.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 4 - In New South Wales, Australia, the worst bushfires in recent history attack multiple towns - overwhelming firefighters and trapping tourists at a lake front caravan park.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australias mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and its stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Wilds of Winter - Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer on the Edge - Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Get ready to understand the science behind Hawaii's stunning beaches. Why does sand appear white, yellow, black, green and red? How do active volcanoes change the coastline? Are other forces at play in shaping these incredible beaches?

programme.desc: Summer on the Edge - Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep9
programme.desc: USA - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands S1 Ep1

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep5

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - Its a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Europe - From the Highlands to the Alps, Europes evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - its not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S3 Ep1

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankinds effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living on the living beach?

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep23
programme.desc: Spark Bees / Best in Show - The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan / Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep75
programme.desc: Flock The Boat - When the pirates show up in San Lorenzo with Tranche trying to find a kidnapped Captain Alonso, Puss and Tranche try to out hero each other

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep76
programme.desc: All Hail, Puss! - With the earthquakes in San Lorenzo becoming unmanageable, Puss turns to the sky gods, who give him mighty powers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep38
programme.desc: How Tag Got Her Tag / Blankie Blaster - Its Show and Tell Day for the Race Cadets! Tag decides to talk about how she got the race flag tag on her collar, but realizes she doesnt know the real story of how she got it. Her family launches into an epic retelling of how Tag got her tag. / Spike is about to launch into space when he calls Tag in a panic to tell her that he left his special blankie behind! He cant sleep without it! Tag, Grandmaw, and Grandpaw race off to the rocket launch to try and get it back to him.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep33

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.desc: B.R.A.P. / It's A Booviful Life - Oh is stuck in an alternate universe; Oh's new ranking as most respected Boov Rapper in Chicago is threatened

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep52
programme.desc: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane - Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep52
programme.desc: Dreadtrux Part 2 - With the mighty Dreadtrux threatening to destroy the crater, Ty considers working with D-Structs to save both of their homes.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep26
programme.desc: Casper The Match Maker / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher - Casper, the Match Maker When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher On take your kid to work day, Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: Noddy And The Case Of The Raining Carrots - Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being Best local Policeman of the year and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep104
programme.desc: Stingo Has Visitors - Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep52
programme.desc: The Noisiest House In The Jungle - The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS Ep13
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep25
programme.desc: Flying High / Nest Sweet Nest - Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep26
programme.desc: Level Up / Reed and the Beanstalk - The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers hes being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! While Eden and Phoebe search for Athena, Reeds on Dew Drop duty for Athena. After successfully helping Athena's kids, Reed is assigned the family in the apartment below Athena. He now gets to join them on more adventures.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.desc: Memory Spark / Wondertusk - Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep26
programme.desc: Clamshell Day - Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: The Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Ruby Tart - On Ruby Day, Chef always celebrates the same traditions, including making a Ruby Tart. But this year, everything goes wrong.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Legend of the Night Howler / The Haystack Stakeout - Sam and Kit track a legendary creature who's spreading an unstoppable itch among prairie dogs. // Who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway/ The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build // Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Days of Summer - Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence Please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Epic Sail - Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Gift Hunt / Paddington's Burns Night Haggis Hunt - Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Ratoncito Perez / The Berry Hungry Caterpillar - Dora helps Ratoncito Perez fix his magic toothbrush wand so she can get a gift for her missing tooth. // Dora meets Carlos, a giant caterpillar who wants to be a butterfly!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Legend of the Night Howler / The Haystack Stakeout - Sam and Kit track a legendary creature who's spreading an unstoppable itch among prairie dogs. // Who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile?

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pup a Doodle Do - Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep208

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Singin in the Tub / Show and Share - Dora and Boots help Benny gain the confidence to sing at the Canta Conmigo show. // Dora helps Boots find a special Heart Banana to show everyone at Show and Share.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup - When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Case of the Scorpion's Sting / The Case of the Constant Dripping - Kit's on the case when an innocent prairie dog is stung out of nowhere. // Something's making a dripping noise that's been bothering some birds - but what?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sniffle / Pups and the Ghost Cabin - A sick day for the PAW Patrol? While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save a Kooky Klimber - Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep221
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland / The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly - Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel / The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail - Builder Cove gets its first hotel when Farmer Zoe's cousin Hadley comes to visit. But will Hadley approve of the new hotel?//A hiking trail mix-up confuses everyone going to Mr. Ducky-Doo's birthday party.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, amarillo.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's Lemonade.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Big Picture - Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Team Truck Challenge - Its the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay. /When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration - It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it!

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Unicornasaurus / The Grumple Games - Dora helps Benny and Uni the Unicornasaurus get their magic paintbrush back. // Dora teams up with Hearty the Grumple so she can finally compete in the Grumple Games.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep201

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, Super Shark and Captain Kelp help to bring it back!
